text:
March 18, 1969
Mr. Robert D. B. Carlisle
Director of Program Development
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
555 Madison Avenue
New York, New York 10022
Dear Bobs
I was asked by personnel at WNYE to prepare brief
comments on the CPB grant to NERN.
The tape is enclosed along with timing, cues and
text.
My instructions were to forward the tape to you
when ready.
Sincerely,
Robert A. Mott
RAMslkl
Enclosures
